🏷️ Check tags
git tag

🚀 Deploying new versions:
git tag 1.2.2-prod && git push origin 1.2.2-prod  # 🚀 Deploy version 1.2.2
git tag 1.2.3-prod && git push origin 1.2.3-prod  # 🚀 Deploy version 1.2.3

⏪ Reverting to previous version:
git tag 1.2.2-prod-revert && git push origin 1.2.2-prod-revert  # ⏪ Rollback to 1.2.2-prod

📈 Scaling up the deployment:
git tag 1.2.2-prod-scale-10 && git push origin 1.2.2-prod-scale-10  # 📈 Scale to 10 instances
